page.title: 15ECOLOGY
page.content: Animals As there are not many people in our block and there are no main roads, the wildlife is very undisturbed. There are various copses where deer can hide. There are also lots of badgers and rabbits. At Kittisford there are also a large number of toads.Bats are frequently seen at the end of the day. A Greater Spotted Woodpecker, Heron and Kingfishers have all been seen recently and almost every day we see Buzzards and Hawks. In the hedgerows this year we have found primroses, violets, early purple orchids,stonecrop, scabious, honeysuckle,foxgloves, speedwell, self heal, woody nightshade,periwinkle, mallow,rosebay willowherb, herb robert,cranesbill,wild strawberry, wild rose,campion,mouse ear & toadflax
